body_html: I am switching my own modules from TH to ATen and my build rules work under the assumption that ATen headers are accessible. I thought that the transition from TH to ATen would preserve these assumptions.
body_text: I am switching my own modules from TH to ATen and my build rules work under the assumption that ATen headers are accessible. I thought that the transition from TH to ATen would preserve these assumptions.
body: I am switching my own modules from TH to ATen and my build rules work under the assumption that ATen headers are accessible. I thought that the transition from TH to ATen would preserve these assumptions.
